наманая

Тут можно убегать от маньяка, играя за четырех несчастных жертв, а можно и наоборот играть в догонялки, за различных маньяков-убийц преследовать выживших. 
Игра возвращает в детство, в то самое время... Ведь каждый помнит, как мы закрывали глаза и лицо ладошками, громко произнося считалочку: "Раз, два, три, четыре, пять, я иду искать. Кто не спрятался – я не виноват".
Very fun game with friends

O jogo é muito divertido , mas se você não quer passar raiva jogue sempre com amigos , porque o jogo necessita de um bom trabalho em equipe,e se você quiser focar mais em jogar com os assasinos, há uma grande variedade deles , cada um possui uma habilidade distinta, sendo divertido jogar com todos eles. Enfim vale a pena comprar o jogo.

Great fun to play with friends, and love that the developers are still adding new things.
Норм

Игре 3 года, но она всё ещё может показать себя. Хотя тут до сих пор присутствуют баги , но всё же игра интересная. Хотя тут бывают конченные игроки, но это разве минус? Короче,покупайте,качайте и играйте.

Игра радует, практически каждый раз, когда в нее заходишь. Постоянное напряжение, атмосфера, звуки. Геймплей не сказать что сложно, но заставит пару раз матюкуться в монитор.
Суть проста: маленькая локацйя, 4 выживших, 5 сломаных генераторов, 2 ворот для побега, 1 убийца.

Но все что есть прекрасного в этой игре убивает жуткий подбор игроков. Система не справедлива совершенно. Да, это не ААА проект, однако могли бы хоть лобби для игроков сделать проще.
Мало того что играя на 16ранге, к тебе может присоедениться 3 выживших с 19 ранга(отыграли 3 игры только), а вот убийца будет 11ранга.
Дак еще чтобы поиграть с друзьями, надо всех позвать к себе в лобби, а потом еще раз подключаться к общему!

Итог: игра стоит своих денег, особенно по скидке, но играть желательно с друзьями.
Фраза великих манов : "Фарм-это зло , фарм-это плохо, фарм-это незаконно."

после тяжелого дня самое то послушать крики гребанных людей, повешанных на крюк..тобой. А еще лучше пригласить своих друзей (если они у тебя есть) + девушку/парня, и наслаждаться криками вместе. Как говорится и в боль, и в радость
Das Spiel ist ein tolles Spiel was man auch echt gut mit Freunden Stunden lang Spielen kann. Es gibt auch viele sachen wo für man grinden kann

топ игра

Рекомендую игру всем. Наиграл 700 + часов, даже не надоела. Пришли вечером пару каток отыграли и все отлично ! (Так было написано в момент 789 часов)
Теперь когда у меня почти две тысячи хочу сказать одно. Не играйте в одного. Это важное условие. Если вы хотите получить удовольствие от игры, то играйте в неё вместе с другом или пати с друзьями. Игра в одного - это чистой воды мазохизм. Игра за маньяка - аналогична.

This review is outdated by all the updates that changed the game greatly. Still leaving it here cuz its true this game can make you mad quick. The game is much more fair now. Would not recommend the game if you cant see in the dark cuz this game is dark as ####. The game can be fun. Surivor gives you the horror vibe while killer makes you feel invincible. Until you rank up. Stay low rank forever.


does not play well on laptop and toxicity in gameplay and sometime community. dont play if u have a small screen. sounds werid but trust me on it. 

this a new review. my last one of this game is really old and i havent played it in a year so im trying it again. i forgot how to play and forgot all the maps and forgot pretty much everything. playing this again with fresh eyes and this was my expirence and my new review.

  first thing was major performance issues. i am using a laptop. wasnt fun to play this game on. the only time i played a game and having a small screen and a small mousepad made it hard to play. another main issue was everytime i played survior it would say loading and nothing happens for ten minutes and i cant exit queue. not sure why. i like playing survior. way easier than killer and i cant get into a match without taking a litteral hour and thats just getting the queue to work. not sure if anyone else expiirences this but this stopped me from playing survior instantly. i did get a couple matches in and they were good. i could tell i was with new players and they saved me and got me killed a couple times. overall a good expirence. another technical issue and then ill move on is i cant skip the main cutscene that plays when u start it up. i know for a fact u you used to be able to. i guess thats what i get for not playing it for almost a year. now moving on.

 after returning after a year, i was surpised my dailys and there progress was still there. also when i played killer, i got maps that favor killer which made me happy cuz its hard to win as killer nowadays. also if i lost on one of those maps, i couldnt blame it on something else. it was my fault. my matches were fair.  i was rank 17 instead 13 which made returning easier too. the rank 15 players i was put up against was a 4 man team and had communication where as killer its all up to you. i know u win in two hits which sounds easy and can be but most of the maps are feel like mazes and its very dark which makes seeing and tracking people a real workout. i heard of sweaty gameplay and it definatly can be. i know i was and i was doing basic chases. anyways the 4 man team was pretty toxic. wouldnt let me do my killer thing and bugged me the whole team. couldnt kill one cuz its 4v1 and i was a lvl 5 killer going against people with way more hours than me. matches like these are very annoying and it happened twice and i rememeber when i was ranking up it happened all the time. sometimes u get lucky with your surviors, sometimes u dont. even with the toxicity with the gameplay the chat was respectful. i was still mad so i didnt talk to them. anyways the point of these stories is the community is still pretty toxic and 4v1 arent fun.  

  the lvling up system and the perk system i had lttle to no issues with. giving killers the darken mist offering makes no sense to me after all these years of playing. the maps are fine but getting looped and lossing track of people cuz of  following scratch marks wrong is very frustrating. some killers seem to be a lot more fun and viable than others. i was using a tracking stealth killer and it didnt help much. when u two shot people, i found the stealth pretty redudunt. my favorite part about this game is probably the hook system. its simple but putting people on hooks has such a major impact on the game. its carzy how much it effects the game. awesome stuff. oh i did find some of the dailys to be ridicoulous and they wanted me to play characters and modes i dont want to play. once u pick your favorite play style and character, u know what i mean. some dailys dont take long to do but it still annoying to me. 

  next issue was i could not get high perfomance and saw some bugs no matter what tried to fix them. i looked up guides but there obsolete, the only thing i could do was change the launch options and that helped some. last isssue was this game surpisingly hard to close out of. minor issue but after closing and restarting so many times it became a bigger issue.

  final verdict: i dont recommoned this game for laptop and there for cant recommend even with the praise i gave it earlier. if i i get a actually computer, i look forward to playing it again someday. game can be fun but with techinical issues and the toxicity that u sometimes get, its hard to recommend. another thing i should note real quick is none of the trailers look like the game. its nowhere near that pretty. the textures on everything is really bad. anyways thats my review. pc version kinda meh. might be better on console. havent tried it there yet,
